name: Burger Boy 2
description:
Play as Burger Boy in a platformer adventure where you save your Fry Buddies again. Test your platforming skills by facing difficult jumps, and enemies. Play with your friends on keyboard or controller to save your Fry Friends!

Credits:
Made with GameMaker 1.4
Sounds made with sfxr & Chiptone
Created by Carl Dehnert, Tina Dang, and Jackson Richie
